trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Cardiff
There were no other sightings in Cardiff on or around August 12th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsSouth Wales Valleys At around 11pm on August 12th 2013 I was busy walking back and forth the kitchen window keeping an eye out for shooting stars when I noticed, straight ahead of me to the West, a large star like light heading towards me through the sky. At first I thought it might be a satellite but then as I looked I thought it was much too large. It carried on as far as I could tell in a straight trajectory until it was almost directly above and then seemed to fade out quite quick. The whole thing took around five minutes Later that evening while talking shooting stars with a friend, she said that she had also seen the unexplainable object but from a slightly different angle.
Summary: Large star like object aproached from the east in a straight flight path, dissapearing as in got roughly over head.
